definitions.definition: a state of human society that is very developed and organized

examples.text: The Victorians regarded the railways as bringing progress and civilization.
to bring civilization to the outer reaches of the country
to reach a higher level of civilization

definitions.definition: a society, its culture and its way of life during a particular period of time or in a particular part of the world

examples.text: the civilizations of ancient Greece and Rome
diseases that are common in Western civilization
The Minoan civilization of Crete used two forms of script.
the early civilizations of the Middle East and China
the great civilizations of the past
a movement that aims to create a new civilization

definitions.definition: all the people in the world and the societies they live in, considered as a whole

examples.text: Environmental damage threatens the whole of civilization.
Could this be the end of civilization as we know it?

definitions.definition: a place that offers you the comfortable way of life of a modern society

examples.text: It's good to be back in civilization after two weeks in a tent!
